DOC.brief_summary: PF-06427878 is a new compound proposed for the treatment of hyperlipidemia. The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics after 2 weeks of dosing of PF-06427878 in overweight-obese, otherwise healthy adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Safety And Pharmacokinetic (PK) Study Of PF-06427878 In Overweight-Obese, Otherwise Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects of non childbearing potential. Body Mass Index (BMI) of >=25 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg Subjects with liver fat >=6% and <=20% Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary,gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease (including drug allergies, but excluding untreated, asymptomatic, seasonal allergies at time of dosing).
